sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>false</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sys_nlu_utterance</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition table="sys_nlu_utterance">utteranceVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="utterance" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/> <item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/> </filter_condition> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Remove Entity Mappings on Update</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) { var prevUtterance = NLUStudioTrainer.deserialiseUtterance(previous.getValue('utterance')); var newUtterance = NLUStudioTrainer.deserialiseUtterance(current.getValue('utterance')); if (prevUtterance !== newUtterance) { var gr = new GlideRecord('m2m_sys_nlu_utterance_entity'); gr.addQuery('utterance', previous.getValue('sys_id')); gr.deleteMultiple(); } })(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2019-04-04 12:31:46</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path/> <sys_id>36cc51aa53603300713cddeeff7b1225</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Remove Entity Mappings on Update</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="NLU Workbench - Core" source="com.glide.nlu">302438683c31311068bcf327dfe37f2f</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_36cc51aa53603300713cddeeff7b1225</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-08-30 21:18:57</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=36cc51aa53603300713cddeeff7b1225"/> </record_update>
